Row.Text: Enhance the characteristics of civilization, all fields except snow field and frozen ground +1 [ICON_FAITH] and [ICON_PRODUCTION], snow field +1 [ICON_CULTURE] and [ICON_SCIENCE], frozen ground +2 [ICON_GOLD], new city territory is wider . [NEWLINE]Dark Age, Combat Strength +10, Golden Age, Construction Area Speed +100%, in any period, Great Businessman, Great Engineer, Great Scientist will have a 33% bonus to the Great Person Points. Units on the continent where the motherland is located Mobility +4. [NEWLINE]

强化文明特性，雪原与冻土以外所有地块+1[ICON_FAITH]与[ICON_PRODUCTION]，雪原+1[ICON_CULTURE]与[ICON_SCIENCE]，冻土+2[ICON_GOLD]， 新城市领土范围更加宽广。[NEWLINE]黑暗时代，战斗力+10，黄金时代，建造区域速度+100%，在任何时期，大商人，大工程师，大科学家的伟人点数都会有33%的加成，在祖国所处大陆的单位移动力+4。[NEWLINE]

強化文明特性，雪原與凍土以外所有地塊+1[ICON_FAITH]與[ICON_PRODUCTION]，雪原+1[ICON_CULTURE]與[ICON_SCIENCE]，凍土+2[ICON_GOLD]， 新城市領土範圍更加寬廣。[NEWLINE]黑暗時代，戰鬥力+10，黃金時代，建造區域速度+100%，在任何時期，大商人，大工程師，大科學家的偉人點數都會有33%的加成，在祖國所處大陸的單位移動力+4。[NEWLINE]
